title: Microsoft Robert
itunes:title: Microsoft Robert
description:
It's a busy week on this ol' podcast as we get into Sifu, our recent Ghostwire: Tokyo demo, more OlliOlli World, an extensive recap of this week's Nintendo Direct, Intellivision's Amico turmoil, the secret true nature of the Lawnmower Man, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:10) Intro
(00:00:34) Nothing should be The Lawnmower Man
(00:05:24) Show Rundown
(00:06:22) GhostWire: Tokyo [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5] on Mar 25, 2022
(00:21:33) First Break
(00:21:37) Sifu [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Feb 08, 2022
(00:43:32) OlliOlli World [Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Feb 08, 2022
(01:00:14) Second Break
(01:00:18) Nintendo Direct
(01:01:45) Chrono Cross Remaster
(01:02:55) Front Mission
(01:03:21) Live A Live
(01:04:30) Star Wars: The Force Unleashed
(01:05:02) Portal
(01:05:29) No Man's Sky
(01:07:21) Klonoa
(01:08:34) Fire Emblem
(01:09:12) Switch Sports
(01:10:57) Mario Kart 8 Deluxe DLC
(01:13:38) Disney Speedstorm
(01:14:00) Kirby and the Forgotten Land
(01:14:52) Splatoon 3
(01:15:30) Mario Strikers: Battle League
(01:16:37) Metroid Dread's new modes
(01:17:27) Earthbound
(01:18:31) Xenoblade Chronicles 3
(01:21:34) Triangle Strategy
(01:21:53) Closing thoughts
(01:25:45) The next GTA is in active development
(01:33:36) Assassin's Creed is getting a smaller, more stealthy, release
(01:38:58) America's Army is shutting down
(01:42:36) Stadia is shifting its focus
(01:48:54) A bit of Capcom was purchased
(01:50:50) Intellivision's Amico might be in trouble
(02:09:55) Thank you and wrapping up
(02:10:17) Mysterious Benefactor Shoutouts
(02:12:04) Thanks and Nextlander upcoming
(02:14:17) See ya

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
